channel.title: New Server Help - iKiller
channel.description:
[img]http://i38.tinypic.com/2z8pw89.jpg[/img]
Hey Guys,
I really need help with my new server I am making, and I have a couple of questions.
1. I have a huge house, and I am using the wireless access point in my bedroom, not my router (The routers in the kitchen)...to run the server, will I need to be connected to my router?
2. We forgot the routers username and password (We changed it), but my dad haves it saved, but when you type in the address of the router, it automatically logs us is (Only on my dads work computer...). So if I open the port on his laptop to like 43594, and then run the server off my computer if I left it downstairs, would that work?
3. Do you know any good client soures? If you do, please can you reply or PM me with them please.
Thanks for your help!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you would like to help me with the server, please could you PM me. You will be be the Co-Owner of it. If the server goes we will get Dedicated Server

Lets all not help him. We don’t need more rsc server here unless you make it so good that you steal rscA players.
